_comment: IMPORTANT: For LABEL-9X00 or other printers, run: PowerShell .\electron\find-label-printer.ps1

usb.comment: UPDATE THESE VALUES! Run find-label-printer.ps1 to detect your LABEL-9X00 printer VID/PID

settings.comment: 48 chars = 80mm paper (POS-9200L supports 110mm labels but prints ESC/POS at 48 chars)

network.comment: Use printer's IP address on your network

serial.comment: Serial port path - COM3, COM4, etc. (Windows) or /dev/ttyUSB0 (Linux)

commonPrinters.note: Run find-label-printer.ps1 to detect your specific LABEL-9X00 printer
